nl.han.ica.Frogger.Menus

Class MenuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.Frogger.Menus.MenuManager

  • public class MenuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The MenuManager that manager every menu (gamemenu/gameovermenu/etc..) and show or hides then when the game stage changes

      • MenuManager

        public MenuManager(GameEngine engine,
                   int screenWidth,
                   int screenHeight)
        Constructs the MenuManager menu and adds the mainmenu as default menu
        Parameters:
        engine - Engine reference to add objects and dashboards
        screenWidth - with of the entire screen
        screenHeight - height of the entire screen

      • MenuManager

        public MenuManager(GameEngine engine,
                   int screenWidth,
                   int screenHeight,
                   boolean inGame)
        Constructs the MenuManager menu and adds a mainmenu or gamemenu as default menu
        Parameters:
        engine - Engine reference to add objects and dashboards
        screenWidth - with of the entire screen
        screenHeight - height of the entire screen
        inGame - specifies if the game or main menu should be the default menu
